articles.title: Boy survives 100ft Grand Canyon fall after dodging tourist photo - BBC
articles.description: The teenager suffered serious injuries when he plunged nearly 100ft (30m).
articles.content:
A 13-year-old boy has survived after slipping and falling nearly 100ft (30m) at the Grand Canyon in the US state of Arizona.
